description: Today's links What's wrong with tariffs: Trump's mirror-world policies fill the vacuum left by neoliberal gaslighting. Hey look at this: Delights to delectate. Object permanence: 2005, 2020 Upcoming appearances: Where to find me. Upcoming appearances: Where to find me. Recent appearances: Where I've been. Latest books: You keep readin' em, I'll keep writin' 'em. Upcoming books: Like I said, I'll keep writin' 'em. Colophon: All the rest. What's wrong with tariffs (permalink) It's not that the Republicans and the Democrats are the same…obviously. But for decades – since Clinton – the Dems have sided with neoliberal economics, just like their Republican counterparts, so the major differences between the two related to overt discrimination, to the exclusion of the economic policies that immiserated working people, with the worst effects landing on racial minorities, women, and gender minorities. So the Dems stood against discrimination in mortgage lending – but no
title: Pluralistic: What's wrong with tariffs (02 Apr 2025)
